masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "A pyrokinetic villain is setting Christmas trees on fire across the city—we've got TWELVE structure fires and counting! He's moving too fast for us to catch. Keeps leaving notes: 'Your trees are kindling and your joy is smoke.' We're overwhelmed. Firefighters are exhausted!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Track the pyromaniac and stop him
  • Help firefighters contain the blazes
  • He's targeting public trees—protect the remaining ones
